SEARCH
Package database

Class Row

java.lang.Object
database.Row
public class Row extends Object
Represents a row in a table, containing a list of cells associated with columns.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Row()
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createCell(Column column)
    Creates a new cell associated with a given column and adds it to the row.
    void
    createCells(ArrayList<Column> columns)
    Creates cells for a list of columns and adds them to the row.
    void
    deleteCell(int index)
    Deletes a cell from the row at the specified index.
    ArrayList<Cell>
    getCells()
    Returns the list of cells in this row.

  • Constructor Details

    • Row

      public Row()

  • Method Details

    • createCell

      public void createCell(Column column)
      Creates a new cell associated with a given column and adds it to the row. Registers the cell with the corresponding column.
      Parameters:
      column - The column to associate the new cell with.

    • createCells

      public void createCells(ArrayList<Column> columns)
      Creates cells for a list of columns and adds them to the row.
      Parameters:
      columns - The list of columns for which cells should be created.

    • deleteCell

      public void deleteCell(int index)
      Deletes a cell from the row at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the cell to be removed.

    • getCells

      public ArrayList<Cell> getCells()
      Returns the list of cells in this row.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of cells in the row.
